glsa.title: Cheetah: Untrusted module search path
glsa.synopsis: Cheetah contains a vulnerability in the module importing code that can allow a local user to gain escalated privileges.

background.p: Cheetah is a Python powered template engine and code generator.

description.p: Brian Bird discovered that Cheetah searches for modules in the world-writable /tmp directory.

impact.p: A malicious local user could place a module containing arbitrary code in /tmp, which when imported would run with escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There are no known workarounds at this time.

resolution.p: All Cheetah users should upgrade to the latest version:
